exam_name: UPESMET - UPES Management Entrance Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
UPESMET 2024: UPES Management Entrance Test (UPESMET 2024) is a university-level entrance test conducted by the University of Petroleum & Energy Studies, Dehradun for admission to its MBA programs. UPESMET is held multiple times a year. Candidates interested in taking UPES Management Entrance Test (UPES MET) can apply online at the official website, upes.ac.in.

UPES Dehradun has commenced the registration process for UPESMET 2024. The application from eligible candidates seeking admission to MBA at UPES Dehradun are sought in online mode only. UPES is a 2-hour-long test and consists of 140 multiple choice questions across fours sections - General English, Quantitative, General Awareness, and Analytical and Logical Reasoning. The entrance exam is followed by Person Interview. The candidates who qualify for the test will be called for the PI round to be held online. Candidates will be allowed to choose a PI slot. The final merit will be based on performance in written test and PI. 

Besides the UPESMET, candidates can also apply through other national level entrance exams such as CAT, MAT, CMAT, etc. The following national level entrance exams will be accepted for shortlisting candidates for the admission process:

  • Students having a minimum MAT / CMAT score of 70 Percentile will be exempted from UPES Management Entrance Test and will only be called for Group Discussion and interviews if qualified. 
  • Valid 50 percentile and the above score of CAT/ XAT
  • A score of a minimum of 400 or above for GMAT, and a score of 120 and above for NMAT scores will also be accepted.

Note: 30 percent of the seats are filled through the national-level entrance tests. In case such seats are vacant, then UPES will fill those seats through UPESMET.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
UPES conducts entrance exams for admission to the MBA programme and they have formulated the UPESMET eligibility criteria. Aspiring test takers must meet the eligibility requirement before filling out the online application form for UPESMET 2024.

The UPES MET 2024 eligibility criteria are mentioned below-

  • Aspirants must obtain a minimum of 50 percent marks at both secondary and higher secondary levels (Class 10 and Class 12)
  • One must be a graduate in any discipline with a minimum of 50 percent marks from a recognized university.
  • Age Limit- There is no age limit as per the eligibility criteria of UPES MET 2024
  • Students in their final year of graduation are eligible for UPES MET 2024, as well only if they can provide the passing certificate at the time of admission.
  • Aspirants who would have qualified in any one of the exams, like CAT/MAT/CMAT/XAT/ NMAT by GMAC/GMAT either the same or the previous year, will be exempted from appearing for UPES MET 2024.

Scholarship criteria

  • Minimum 80 percentile score in CAT/XAT
  • Minimum 90 percentile score in MAT, NMAT, UPESMET & any other National Level Entrance Test.
  • 5% seats in each program for a 25% tuition fee waiver in 1st semester

exam_name: ATMA - AIMS Test for Management Admissions

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Association of Indian Management Schools (AIMS) has announced the ATMA 2024 exam result for the July cycle on its official website. The candidate can print their result of the ATMA exam in online mode at atmaaims.com. To know the ATMA 2024 exam results, students should enter their PID number and password. Based on the ATMA 2024 result, the B-schools accepting ATMA scores will announce the shortlisted candidates for the next rounds of admission. The shortlisted candidates are required to appear for the Group Discussion (GD) or Written Ability Test (WAT) and Personal Interview (PI) rounds.

About ATMA 2024

AIMS conducts the ATMA exam four times a year to offer admission into MBA, PGDM, and PGDBA. More than 740 top B-schools in India accept ATMA scores in India to provide admission to candidates in management courses.  The ATMA exam 2024 will be conducted as a centre-based online test. For the July cycle, the ATMA exam 2024 is scheduled to be held on July 31, 2024.

The ATMA 2024 exam duration is 3 hours. As per the ATMA 2024 exam pattern, there are MCQs across verbal reasoning, numerical reasoning, and analytical ability. ATMA mock/ dry test is also available on the ATMA official website, atmaims.com.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Before filling out the ATMA application form, candidates are advised to go through the ATMA 2024 eligibility criteria. Details pertaining to the educational qualification required marks required, age limit, and related are mentioned under the ATMA eligibility criteria 2024. AIMS has specified the ATMA eligibility criteria which are given below.

  • Educational Qualification - Candidates must be graduates who have completed their Bachelor’s degree in any discipline from an accredited Institution or University. Candidates in their final year of graduation are also eligible to apply for ATMA 2024.
  • Age limit – There is no age bar for candidates who wish to take ATMA 2024.
  • Repeaters - Aspirants who have previously appeared for the exam can re-apply for the exam.
  • Work Experience – Not necessary; as both working and non-working aspirants can apply.

NOTE: Aspirants must check that they duly fulfill the eligibility criteria before applying for ATMA 2024 to avoid their candidature from being at the time of admission.

application_process.html_content:
AIMS opened the window to fill out the application form for ATMA 2024 for the July session on June 24. The ATMA 2024 application form is available in online mode on the official website, i.e., atmaaims.com till July 24. The details related to the ATMA application form 2024 start and end date, the process of application, and fees to be paid are given in this article. ATMA 2024 application form can be referred to for a detailed understanding of the process.

Steps to fill ATMA Application Form 2024

Step 1: Make ATMA fees payment of Rs 2000

Firstly candidates need to make payment for the ATMA 2024 entrance exam. The fees can be paid on the official website of ATMA in online mode. The last date of fee payment is July 22, 2024.

Step 2: Fill out the ATMA 2024 application form

After making payments, use the login credentials and enter the PID created along with the password to log in. Now start filling out the ATMA application form 2024. 

Fill in details such as name, email ID, gender, address, nationality, educational background, qualification details, and a professional degree (if any). While filling out the application form for ATMA 2024, choose the test centre of your choice.

Step 3: Upload documents as per specification

AIMS requires candidates to upload documents such as a photograph, signature, OBC (NC)/SC/ST/DAP certificate, mark sheets, and other documents for the purpose of verification.

Step 4: Take the printout for reference

Once all the above steps are done, download the confirmation page and keep safe its printout for reference.

admit_card.html_content:
AIMS issued the ATMA admit card for the July session on July 29, 2024. The ATMA exam 2024 admit card is an important document to carry to appear for the test. Registered applicants can download the ATMA admit card from the official website through candidate login, using PID and password. The hard copy of the ATMA 2024 hall ticket will not be sent to any candidate as it is made available only in online mode. 

Login Page to Download ATMA 2024 Admit Card:

Details mentioned on the ATMA Admit Card 2024:

  • Candidate’s Name and Address
  • Exam Date, Time, and Venue
  • Photograph of candidates
  • Instructions related to the exam and test day

Documents to carry along with ATMA Admit Card 2024

Candidates should have any one of the following documents with them along with the admit card:

  • Voter ID Card
  • Aadhar Card 
  • Passport
  • Driving License
  • PAN Card etc.

cutoffs.html_content: N/A

faqs.question: Is there any concession of fees?
faqs.answer: Yes, Female candidates will have a 25% concession on the application fee and a 50% concession is applicable for applicants belonging to the North-Eastern states of India. The ATMA application fee for general category is Rs 2000.

faqs.question: Can I fill the ATMA 2024 registration form in offline mode?
faqs.answer: No, the ATMA 2024 application form is available in online mode only.

faqs.question: Can I apply for ATMA 2024 if my result of qualifying examination is awaited?
faqs.answer: Yes, candidates in the final year of qualifying examination or result awaited can apply provided they submit the proof of documents before the prescribed date.

exam_name: ALLIANCE-AMAT - Alliance Management Aptitude Test

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
AMAT 2025: Alliance Management Aptitude Test, better known as AMAT is a standardized test conducted by the Alliance School of Business to select candidates for the MBA programme at Alliance School of Business, Bangalore. 

AMAT 2025 application process in ongoing. Interested and eligible candidates can fill out the AMAT application form by visiting the official website. Alliance AMAT 2025 is a pen-paper-based exam of 60 minutes and comprises distinct four sections, namely Quantitative, Conceptual, General Knowledge, and General English including Reading Comprehension. 

The test is composed of around 65 multiple-choice questions; each carrying 1 and 2 marks. Each correct answer carries a +1 mark whereas each incorrect answer will face a penalty of -0.25 mark. Alliance AMAT 2025 will be conducted to select students for the academic session of MBA/PGDM 2025 (January and July Intake).

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Aspirants planning to appear for Alliance AMAT 2025 need to fulfill the eligibility criteria prescribed by the exam conducting authority, Alliance School of Business, Bangalore.

Following are the eligibility criteria for appearing in Alliance AMAT 2025-

  • Obtain a Graduate degree from any recognized college/university
  • 50% marks (45% for SC/ST) in aggregate across domains.
  • Candidates are also required to take any one of the following entrance exams: AMAT/ CAT/ NMAT/ GMAT/ XAT/ MAT/ CMAT/ KMAT.

application_process.html_content:
Candidates, after fulfilling the eligibility criteria of AMAT 2025 are required to submit the completed application form before the deadline. Aspirants can fill out the Alliance AMAT application form 2025 both in online and offline modes.

Online- 

  • Visit the official website.
  • Register in the web account and create application credentials (ID and Password)
  • Log in using your ID and password
  • Start the application process for AMAT 2025
  • Submit the completed Alliance AMAT 2025 application form by making the payment of the stipulated amount.

Offline-

  • Visit the official website.
  • Register in the web account and create application credentials (ID and Password)
  • Log in using your ID and password
  • Download the AMAT application form 2025 and send in the filled-in form along with a Demand Draft (DD) drawn in favour of "ALLIANCE UNIVERSITY" payable at Bengaluru to the address given below-

Office of Recruitment, Careers, and Admissions 

Address: Alliance University - Central Campus,
Chikkahadage Cross Chandapura-Anekal, Main Road,
Bengaluru, Karnataka 562106

Email Address: mba@alliance.edu.in
Phone Number: +91 98860 02500 and +91 99002 29974

admit_card.html_content: N/A

cutoffs.html_content: N/A

Alliance School of Business, Bangalore conducts AMAT (Alliance Management Aptitude Test) in offline mode. The total duration of Alliance AMAT 2025 is 60 minutes/ one hour and comprises four sub-sections, namely Quantitative, Conceptual, General Knowledge, and General English including Reading Comprehension. 

  • The test is composed of 65 multiple-choice questions; each carrying 1 mark. As per the Alliance AMAT 2025 exam pattern, the total marks allotted to the exam are 65.  
  • Each correct answer will fetch a +1 mark whereas each incorrect response will call for a deduction of -0.25 mark. 
  • The weightage of Quantitative, Conceptual, General Knowledge and General English is 15 for each section and 5 for Comprehension.

exam_name: SRMJEEM - SRM Joint Entrance Exam Management

about_exam.heading: About
about_exam.description:
Latest Update: SRM University, Chennai has started SRMJEEM registration 2024, seeking applications from eligible and interested candidates. The SRM Joint Entrance Exam Management will be conducted in three phases in February, April, and June. Registration for phase 1 (February session) is ongoing at the official website of SRM University, applications.srmist.edu.in. The last date to submit SRM JEEM application for Phase 1 is February 18, and the exam will be conducted on February 24.

The SRM Joint Entrance Exam for Management or SRMJEEM 2024 is a university-level MBA entrance exam conducted by SRM University, Chennai for admission to its two-year MBA programmes offered at all branches of the university. To appear for SRM JEEM, candidates must meet the eligibility criteria as laid by the university. SRM JEEM 2024 will be conducted in remote proctored mode. Those who have a valid score in CAT, XAT, GMAT, NMAT, CMAT or TANCET  do not need to appear for the SRM JEEM. Based on scores in the entrance exam, candidates will be shortlisted for GD, PI.

eligibility_criteria.html_content:
Candidates who wish to apply for SRM University MBA must fulfil the following SRMJEEM 2024 eligibility criteria:

  •  It is necessary to have a Bachelor’s or Master’s degree completed in regular or part-time mode from any government/government-recognized private institution. Additionally, they need to secure a minimum of  60 per cent aggregate marks or 3 out of 5 CGPA or 6 out of 10 CGPA at the said examinations to be eligible for SRMJEEM 2024.
  • Candidates appearing for their final year exams of graduation or post-graduation are also eligible to apply. They should complete the said qualifying degree by April-May 2024 and should produce a proof of passing their degree examination on or before the second week of August 2024.
  • There is no age limit to apply for SRMJEEM 2024.

application_process.html_content:
The application form of SRMJEEM 2024 is available only in online mode.  While filling SRMJEEM application form, candidates will have to pay a fee of Rs. 1200 in any of the modes such as Net Banking, Credit Card, Debit Card, UPI, Wallet. The requisite documents like scan of candidate’s photograph, signature, Class 10 and 12 marksheet along with the score card of Bachelor’s degree must be uploaded at the time of form-filling.  

In order to apply SRMJEEM 2024, applicants first need to register on the official website of SRM Institute of Science and Technology. After registration, the application form of SRMJEEM 2024 will be available for download. The detailed procedure of SRMJEEM application form 2024 is as follows:

How to fill SRMJEEM application form – online mode:

  • Visit the official website of SRM University
  • Go to the admission 2024 section and click on ‘Apply’ next to the Master of Business Administration (MBA) programme. 
  • Register and create your account by entering full name, valid email ID and phone number.
  • Fill up the application form of SRMJEEM 2024 carefully. Upload scanned copies of candidate’s coloured photograph, signature, photo ID proof, Graduation class 10th and 12th marksheets in the prescribed format when instructed. Check the form before pressing the final submit button. 
  • Pay the application fee of Rs. 1200 online through the various payment modes available. 

How to fill SRMJEEM application form – offline mode:

Download the application form of SRMJEEM 2024 from the official website of SRM University. The duly filled form must be sent through mail to SRM Institute of Science and Technology, Chennai along with a Demand Draft (DD) of Rs 1200. The application form should be submitted before the last day of registration as specified. 

Candidates will be required to book a slot for the SRMJEEM 2024 entrance exam post the application procedure. The admit card of SRMJEEM 2024 can be downloaded and printed after the slot booking is done. 

Additionally, the cost of offline application form is Rs. 1200.

admit_card.html_content:
The admit card of SRMJEEM 2024 will be available only to those students whose application forms have been successfully submitted. SRMJEEM hall ticket 2024 will be available for download after the application process has concluded. The admit card of the SRM MBA exam is an important document that needs to be carried to the exam center on the day of the SRMJEEM exam. It must be noted that it will be made available only to those candidates who have completed the registration of SRMJEEM 2024. 

Follow the steps below to download SRMJEEM admit card: 

  • Visit the official website of SRM Institute of Science and Technology.
  • Click on the ‘SRMJEEM 2024 Admit Card’ link.
  • Enter the application number and Date of Birth as mentioned on the application form.
  • The hall ticket of SRMJEEM 2024 will appear on the screen.
  • Download it and take a printout.

In case of any errors found on the admit card, the same needs to be reported immediately to the authorities. 

Details mentioned on the SRMJEEM admit card:

  • Candidate’s name
  • Date of Birth
  • Application number
  • Date, time and venue of the SRMJEEM exam.
  • Candidate’s contact details
  • Instructions related to the exam 

Candidates must make sure that they carry the admit card to the exam centre. Candidates found without admit cards will not be allowed to enter the exam hall. 

Documents to be carried with the admit card

The following documents must be carried along with the SRMJEEM 2024 admit card:

  • Voter’s ID Card
  • Aadhar Card
  • Passport
  • Driving License
  • PAN Card

cutoffs.html_content: N/A

Exam_Pattern.html_content:
SRMJEE 2024 will be conducted in online mode for a duration of 150 minutes or two and a half hours. As per the exam pattern of SRMJEEM 2024, it will an objective-type test with 100 MCQs distributed across five sections as below:

The syllabus of SRMJEEM 2024 is available on the official website for candidates to refer before they begin with their preparation. Aspirants may also solve the SRMJEEM 2024 model test paper available on the website to familiarise themselves with the exam pattern of SRMJEEM 2024.
